label: National (50 States + DC)
description: Custom code using '00' to denote national scope

label: States
source: U.S. Census Bureau, Population Division; American National Standards Institute (ANSI) Codes for States, the District of Columbia, Puerto Rico, and the Insular Areas of the United State

label: Counties
source: U.S. Census Bureau, Population Division; FIPS Codes for Counties and County Equivalent Entities

label: Metropolitan/Micropolitan (state part)
description: Identifies 7-digit code constructed from the 2-digit state FIPS code and the 5-digit CBSA code provided by the Census Bureau’s Geography Division
source: U.S. Census Bureau, Population Division; Office of Management and Budget, July 2023 delineations

label: Metropolitan (complete)
description: Identifies 5-digit CBSA code for metropolitan areas provided by the Census Bureau’s Geography Division. Balance of state including micropolitan areas are identified by custom codes as [ST]999
source: U.S. Census Bureau, Population Division; Office of Management and Budget, July 2023 delineations

label: Workforce Investment Areas
description: 2-digit state FIPS code and the 6-digit WIA identifier provided by LED State Partners
